title: Where is the Pella company located? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on which Pella are you looking for Greece - ancient & modern Pella, capital of the ancient kingdom of MacedonPella (regional unit), administrative unit in Macedonia, GreecePella (municipality), the modern town near the site of ancient PellaPella (Thessaly), town of ancient Thessaly, GreeceAncient Near East Pella (Palestine), ancient bishopric named after:Pella, Jordan, ancient city in JordanApamea (Syria), called Pella during the Macedonian occupationEurope (apart from Greece) Pella, Piedmont, municipality in the Province of NovaraPella Palace, residence of Catherine the Great near St. PetersburgPella Square, a main square in Skopje, Republic of MacedoniaAfrica Pella, Burkina Faso, cityPella, Northern Cape, town in South AfricaAmerica Pella, Iowa, city in the United StatesPella, Wisconsin, town in the United StatesPella (CDP), Wisconsin, census-designated place in the town.
Pella lies in northern Greece, about 90 km (56 mi) northwest of Thessaloniki. It is the historical capital of the ancient kingdom of Macedon and birthplace of Alexander the Great
